Give Monster Rancher to the Game Grumps!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: January 2013 Topics: Give Monster Rancher to the Game Grumps!
By Anonymous on Wednesday, January 30, 2013 - 01:05 pm:

That's right, JonTron (Jon Jafari) and Egorapter (Arin Hanson), also known as the GameGrumps are playing games and they're accepting games to play!

So why would they play a game like Monster Rancher? Well, because of one of their latest playthroughs on Amazing Island. This video to be exact: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2oVaQD8JXhA

At 05:05 over, they'll start talking about Monster Rancher for a bit and how the games were fun. So, I'm just throwing a curve ball here, but what if someone gives them one of the Monster Rancher games? We could possibly make Monster Rancher popular again!

just open/close the tray and it should resume from
there. Unless the game just keeps freezing even not
on loading screens then there is nothing that can be
done :(

By Jennimason0990 on Saturday, February 9, 2013 - 06:44 am:

I recently got a working used copy of MR1 on amazon. It's the only working copy I currently have so I can't part with it, but there are a few other copies of the game listed, might be worth a try Zercker. MR2 has listings as well from the look of things.
The condition was passable, the disk was in good condition, with very slight abrasions on the front, but no visible marks on the back. The case was cracked and dirty, but held up through shipping, and the booklet was included but pages were bent and some slight wear on the edges. So, don't expect it to be in mint condition if you do order one online though.
Also, Have you tried all your copies on multiple Playstations, Zercker? I know my old PS2 before it died started to freeze when playing MR2, but the new one I got reads it perfectly fine.

Anyway, back at the point - I would love to see a popular LPer (or LP duo, as the case may be) tackle one of the older Monster Rancher games, maybe now when I go on about my new champion people's eyes will stop glazing over!
